text:
Mr. Seymour Siegel
-3-
Januaiy 17, 1951
I am slightly in doubt as to whether or not you did include Novik among those
whom you appointed to this Advisory Committee. I decided that before I wrote
to any of the appointees, I would check with you to be sure I had the right
names.
By the way, I am all out of NASD letterheads. Will you please send
me another supply?
Best regards.
enc.
gk
ccj Graydon Ausmus
W. I. Griffith
Sincerely,
Burton Paulu
Publications Editor and Secretary
